_PAGE_FILTER_DEFAULT_FOR_EMPTY_ARGUMENTS: Der Standardwert, der zurückgegeben wird, wenn der überprüfte Wert als leer betrachtet wird

# Arguments:  
value (Any): The value to be checked
[emptyValue="-"] (String): The default value returned if the checked value is considered empty
_PAGE_FILTER_DEFAULT_FOR_EMPTY_DESCRIPTI: The function filterDefaultForEmpty is used to check a value and return a default value if the checked value is considered empty. In this context, a value is considered empty if it is undefined, null or an empty string.
